snippet.title: Dungeon Keeper - the Most Diabolically Fun Strategy Game on Google Play
snippet.description:
Dungeon Keeper is now available on the App Store and Google Play in Canada, Singapore, Australia and Norway.  Download today at: http://smarturl.it/DKFB

Worldwide release this winter!

Welcome Back Keeper! 

It's good to be bad in Dungeon Keeper -- the most diabolically fun strategy game on mobile!

Build the ultimate underground lair and summon dark forces to do your bidding. From Imps and Trolls, to Bile Demons and Warlocks, you'll need more than your wit to stop invaders bent on destroying your dungeon's heart. Maximize your defenses to thwart invaders with expertly laid traps and dungeon design. Then, attack enemy dungeons and plunder their resources. With comically sinister interactions, brilliant character art, and addictive PVP/PVE action, Dungeon Keeper will soon become your guiltiest of pleasures.

FEATURES: 
• FREE TO PLAY
• Pillage and plunder other players' dungeons 
• Setup the ultimate dungeon and protect it from from invading players 
• Amass an army of diabolical minions to do your bidding
• Motivate your minions to work faster with a some "gentle" encouragement
• Fun and challenging single player campaign
• Unlock achievements and dominate the leaderboards
• Open-ended & expansive universe -- unlock new spells, traps, minions & more!

Dig.  Devise.  Dominate. It's good to be bad in Dungeon Keeper! Download today!

For the latest Dungeon Keeper news and announcements:
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/dungeonkeepermobile
Follow us on Google+ https://plus.google.com/104775986854548984817/posts or Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/eadungeonkeeper
